scripts.start: DEBUG=server:server NODE_ENV=production npx env-cmd --file .env.production pm2 start server/bin/www.js --name bot-tool --cron-restart='6 * * * *'
scripts.amm: DEBUG=server:server npx env-cmd --file .env.production pm2 start src/balanceExchangeRate/runListen.js --name amm-tool
scripts.amm-cron: DEBUG=server:server npx env-cmd --file .env.production pm2 start src/balanceExchangeRate/runListen.js --name amm-tool --cron-restart='6 * * * *'
scripts.holder: DEBUG=server:server npx env-cmd --file .env.production pm2 start src/scripts/withdraw/withdrawIncreaseHolders.js --name holder-script --cron-restart='*/30 * * * *'
scripts.big-holder-cron: DEBUG=server:server npx env-cmd --file .env.production pm2 start src/scripts/withdraw/withdrawIncreaseBigHolders.js --name big-holders --cron-restart='*/30 * * * *'
scripts.fill-holder-cron: DEBUG=server:server npx env-cmd --file .env.production pm2 start src/scripts/holder/fillEmptyHolders.js --name fill-holders --cron-restart='*/30 * * * *'
